title: Raising Cane’s Hidden Menu: 7 Ways to Upgrade Your Order

steps.title: Replace your Cane’s Sauce with this honey mustard hack.
steps.content: Replace your Cane’s Sauce with this honey mustard hack. While nothing compares to the zesty flavor of their original sauce, Raising Cane’s homemade honey mustard is a serious competitor. This tangy condiment is slightly spicy and sweet and pairs well with everything on the menu. [1] X Research source While this sauce isn't featured on their normal menu, most locations make it on site.

steps.title: Order your chicken “naked” for a carb-friendly alternative.
steps.content: Order your chicken “naked” for a carb-friendly alternative. If you’re on a keto diet, you can still enjoy Raising Cane’s chicken fingers without feeling guilty. This simple hack involves frying your chicken without any batter, making it the perfect low-carb option. Even without the breading, your chicken is still juicy, mouth watering, and delicious. [2] X Research source If you want to spice things up, pick up Louisiana Hot Sauce from the condiments section and sprinkle it over your chicken.

steps.title: Satisfy your crinkle-cut cravings with extra crispy fries.
steps.content: Satisfy your crinkle-cut cravings with extra crispy fries. Think there isn’t a hack for good ol’ fries? We’re about to teach you a game changer. Order your crinkle-cut fries extra crispy for the perfect side that leaves you wanting more… Seconds or thirds, anyone? [3] X Research source Dip your fries in ketchup, Cane’s Sauce, or their hidden honey mustard, or go crazy and mix them together.

steps.title: Request your chicken extra crispy for a flavorful and crunchy bite.
steps.content: Request your chicken extra crispy for a flavorful and crunchy bite. Nothing beats Raising Cane’s classic fried chicken… unless it's extra, extra crunchy. For a salivating spin on their signature item, ask for your chicken fingers extra crispy—it’s guaranteed to hit the spot (and leave you in a food coma). [4] X Research source

steps.title: Switch the Kaiser roll on your chicken sandwich with Texas Toast.
steps.content: Switch the Kaiser roll on your chicken sandwich with Texas Toast. While the regular chicken sandwich is delicious on its own, you can upgrade your order by subbing the Kaiser roll with Texas Toast. The buttery notes of the toast enhance the flavors of the sandwich, making it the perfect meal to satisfy your Cane’s cravings. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Ask for your toast B.O.B (buttered on both sides).
steps.content: Ask for your toast B.O.B (buttered on both sides). Normally, Raising Cane’s only butters and toasts their bread on one side, but you can request more butter for an indulgent treat. By adding extra butter, your Texas Toast gets crispier than before, making it even more dreamy and delicious. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Request an entire cup of Cane’s sauce to dunk everything into.
steps.content: Request an entire cup of Cane’s sauce to dunk everything into. If you’re the ultimate Caniac, you know you can drown your entire meal in Cane’s sauce. While this hack might not be possible at every location, ask if you can order 22 oz of their signature condiment. Even if you don’t finish it, you can take it home and enjoy it the rest of the week. [7] X Research source
